ygData.subject: Serpentor's Dream/Destiny!
ygData.msgSnippet: Serpentor: Being carried by Anubis, Serpentor continued to dream. He was on Cybertron, deep under the metallic surface, speaking with Optimus Prime. Welcome,

Subject: Serpentor's Dream/Destiny!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From: KSLawdogg@...

Serpentor:


Being carried by Anubis, Serpentor continued to dream.

He was on Cybertron, deep under the metallic surface, speaking with Optimus 
Prime.

"Welcome, Serpentor.  I, am Optimus Prime.  I...can't tell you what the 
Matrix is.  No one can.  You have to see it for yourself."

"How do I see it?  I thought it was all mystical and such."

"Oh...good point.  Well, I guess you're screwed!" he chuckled.

"I don't believe in fairy tales!" Serpentor yelled, running forward.

Optimus Prime lifted jumped into the air, time seeming to freeze around him, 
his foot snapping forward, sending Serpentor slamming backwards, clanging 
against the dark ground.

Serpentor felt a dozen body blows, followed by a kick of some sort.  He got 
up slowly.  He hadn't seen any of the causes of the pain.  Optimus Prime one 
more seemed to be the only thing not being frozen in time, but Serpentor 
suddenly leapt forward, tackling Optimus Prime, punching him repeatedly until 
his  face plate snapped halfway off.

-=Serpentor.  I, amd the Matrix.  You have a higher calling!  The fool, 
Vulois, has been smoking something and thinks CyberTRON should be organic, 
and that I told him to do that.  Yu, and three others must stop him and his 
cadre of blasphemers=-

"I thought it was two?  Scattershot, Nemesis Enforcer, and myself?"

-=And Shockw...how the slag did you know?!=-

"I am one with my inner peace."

-=Get out of my site!=-

(other than to get maybe a cheap laugh, reading after this has no real value 
other than learning what I really act like)

Serpentor appeared in a room, the walls padded, and Zardus, Fidget, Hell 
Beast, Joseph Stalin, Mr. Floppy, and William Shatner were all in there, 
binded by straight jackets, except for Serpentor.

"Come, Comrade Zardus!  Unbind me and we may rebuild the Soviet Union, your 
Russian ancestors will be proud!" Stalin said, straining against the jacket.

"I'm not Russian you fool!  I'm not even human!  What's the Soviet Union?"

"The Soviet Union, the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics!  READ A BOOK!" 
Hell Beast snapped at Zardus.

"Come on, Hell Beast, I'll whip-smack you like a little girl!" the straight 
jackets came off each of the robots.  

Hell Beast got up, Zardus poking his eyes with two fingers.  "Cheater!" Hell 
Beast yelled, Zardus laughing manically, taking out a baseball bat and 
beating Hell Beast's head to a pupl.  "DIE DIE DIE!  I will now rule the 
Predacon Empire!"

"It...is...the...Predacon...Alliance...not...Empire!  You...are... a 
fool...Zardus.  I...should...lead the Predacons...to...victory!" William 
Shatner cried, quickly simmering down after the baseball bat slammed into his 
head a dozen times.

A tooth was knocked loose, piercing Stalin's jugular vein, killing the 
ex-leader of the Red Menace.

"Oh, my god, you killed Stalin!  Why am I here?  All you did was kill me!  
LEAVE ME ALONE YOU PSYCHO!" Fidget yelled, Serpentor taking Zardus' bat and 
beating on Fidget for a dozen minutes or so with the baseball bat.  "Don't 
talk back to the law!"

"Excellent, Scattershot!  Let us conquer Cybertron now!"

"I'm not Scattershot.  SCATTERSHOT IS CRAZY, I'M NOT CRAZY!" Serpentor 
yelled, punching Zardus, a gold club in his hands.  Swinging the golf club 
hard, it connected with Zardus' head, sending the Predacon leader slamming 
into the metal door headfirst, falling to the ground a vegetable humming  
"Row, row, row your boat."

Serpentor raised his arms in triumph.  "All hail Emperor Serpentor!  Long 
live the-UGH!" Serpentor fell to his knees, a sword in his back, falling to 
his chest, dead.

Mr. Floppy, the grey bunny from "Unhappily Everafter", jumped on his back.

"Hey!  What'd I tell you?  Ze bunnies always win!  And...Drew Barrymore...if 
you're watching...I'm just gonna let you know I'll be sparing you from the 
wrath of the Bunny Khan!  AHAHAHAHAHAHA!" 

Serpentor's optics slid open, seeing Anubis place him in a CR chamber.

"Sweet dreams, Serpentor!"

"No.......no.....more.......dreams....." Serpentor said in an inaudible 
whispered, trying to scream as he couldn't see anything but the light from 
his optic sensors.
